other_tests.findings: Expressed 700cc of bloody-looking fluid. A pericardium specimen revealed chronic inflammation, fibrosis and granulation tissue but no malignancy, confirmed by cytology.

Multiple gallstones and gallbladder sludge identified. Irregular gallbladder wall contour with pericholecystic fluid identified, concerning for perforated gallbladder. The gallbladder wall is thickened up to 6 mm.
